alert.note: Alert for Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Perry, northwestern Saline and northwestern Pulaski Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Jessieville to near Hot Springs Village. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Houston... Little Italy... Wye Mountain... Williams Junction... Roland in Pulaski County... Bigelow... Fourche... Antioch in Perry County... Wye... Oak Grove in Perry County... New Dixie... Paron... Thornburg... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Reform... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
